entries.title: Why your technology stack must be aligned with your company's growth strategy
entries.description: To optimize and better make use of software application investments, companies can perform an application rationalization audit.

entries.title: The 5 best iPads for drawing of 2023
entries.description: We use our iPads for everything these days, so why not for drawing, too? The best iPads for drawing let you create digital masterpieces with ease.

entries.title: The best silent mouse of 2023
entries.description: A silent mouse operates quietly, helping you work while keeping your surroundings peaceful. We've included some top models from brands like Logitech, Razer, and more.

entries.title: New John Deere agreement is a win for the 'right to repair' movement
entries.description: John Deere signed an agreement that allows farmers to fix their equipment closer to home. It's a win for supporters of the right to repair movement, but there's still loopholes in the current rules.

entries.title: The 5 best Chromebooks for work in 2023
entries.description: Chromebooks offer fantastic features, such as touchscreens, fast processors, and decent storage, allowing you all the tools you need to knock out your work. Plus, you'll have some fun doing so.

entries.title: Flipper Zero: 'Can you really hack Wi-Fi networks?' and other questions answered
entries.description: You have Flipper Zero questions. I have answers.

entries.title: UDP vs TCP: What's the difference?
entries.description: Here is your guide to the major differences between the internet communications protocols.

entries.title: How to factory-reset your Windows 10 PC
entries.description: Whether you're trying to fix an ongoing technical glitch or you plan to give your PC away or sell it, a factory reset is a handy option.

entries.title: I grew a little garden on my houseboat. Here's how
entries.description: Review: The Smart Garden 9 Pro is easy to use and can brighten up any home, on land or at sea.

entries.title: The 5 best car battery chargers of 2023
entries.description: Freezing weather can deplete your car's battery power significantly -- to the point your vehicle needs a boost. The best car battery chargers are easy to use and work with a wide variety of vehicles.

entries.title: I'm running my own Mastodon server on a Raspberry Pi. Here's what I've learned
entries.description: There's something liberating about knowing that I own the entire experience, including all of my data -- and it's all stored in my basement.

entries.title: The 5 best 70-inch TVs of 2023
entries.description: To really enjoy your program, you need a big screen to see detail and color. That is why we look for the best 70-inch TVs to add to your viewing experience.

entries.title: Real world water-saving solutions announced at CES 2023

entries.title: How to download YouTube videos for free: Plus two other ways
entries.description: We offer you two straightforward download options and a more technical Linux command line option.

entries.title: Warning: Your private YouTube videos aren't 100% private
entries.description: YouTube's Content ID system exists to protect copyright holders from infringement. But does scanning unlisted and private videos go too far? We explore the issue here.

entries.title: This laptop stylus that can strangely write on paper is my favorite CES gadget
entries.description: It's not magic. It's the MSI Pen 2, a graphite stylus that can magically write on screen and paper.

entries.title: People are already trying to get ChatGPT to write malware
entries.description: Analysis of chatter on dark web forums shows that efforts are already under way to use OpenAI's chatbot to help script malware.

entries.title: This Mac ransomware is old but it could still cause you big problems
entries.description: Ransomware is a major cybersecurity issue - and it doesn't matter which operating system you use.

entries.title: Jack Ma to cede control of Alibaba's fintech business in shareholder revamp
entries.description: Ant Group says Alibaba Group's founder Jack Ma will no longer have controlling voting rights over the fintech company following the completion of changes to improve governance and transparency.
